alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong outflow winds will impact portions of western Tooele County through 530 PM MDT... At 444 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers near Dugway Proving Ground Test Range, or 29 miles west of Dugway English Village, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wendover, Dugway English Village, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range, Utah Test and Training Range South, Knolls, Ibapah, Clive, Skull Valley and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 1 and 58. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
